thread.title: Microsoft Edge to Support Google's VP9 Codec for High-Quality Video Streams
thread.title_full: Microsoft Edge to Support Google's VP9 Codec for High-Quality Video Streams - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Edge to Support Google's VP9 Codec for High-Quality Video Streams
text: Microsoft just announced plans to support Google's VP9 video codec with future versions of its Edge Web browser. VP9 is a modern, royalty-free video codec developed by Google, which was created for its WebM file format, designed specifically for usage with the HTML5 video tag. VP9 evolved from the problematic VP8 video codec, ... Â»
